tasks.title: Research: Design comprehensive FastMCP TypeScript tools for Make.com development and customization
tasks.description:
Research and analysis required for implementing: "Design comprehensive FastMCP TypeScript tools for Make.com development and customization"

**Implementation Task Details:**
Design tool architecture, core tool definitions (6-8 tools), TypeScript interfaces, API client integration, authentication patterns, error handling, development workflow support, and testing approaches for Make.com Custom Apps API and Templates API within FastMCP framework

**Research Objectives:**
1. Investigate best practices and methodologies for this implementation
2. Identify potential challenges, risks, and mitigation strategies  
3. Research relevant technologies, frameworks, and tools
4. Define implementation approach and architecture decisions
5. Provide actionable recommendations and guidance

**Implementation Task ID:** task_1756144824875_ppwfoo39v

**Auto-created by:** TaskManager research dependency system
**Research Priority:** This research task must be completed before implementation begins
success_criteria: Implementation guidance and best practices identified
Risk assessment and mitigation strategies outlined
